Html:
I can't seem to find this buff am I missing it or is it not implemented?

Thanks for the excellent work this is an amazing tool especially since you can edit the items. I was able to add steelweave to my cloak by coping the one I had and just giving it 12 more def.

Thank you so much for the work you have done.

You may need to upgrade to the latest version; Steelweave is included in the built-in enchant list since b13. Regarding fel armor, I'm not sure. The guy doing the Warlock model, CBennight, seems MIA at the moment.

Yeah, I upgraded I was just saying it's great to be able to edit the items and the steelweave was just an example. I did that in b12.1 but now have it as an enchant in b13.1. With the ability to edit you can toss in different gems than the predefined and not have to have 20 variations in the selection lists (although you can if you want) it's that flexibility that is really great.

Thanks for the reply. I only wish I knew more about the languages you are using so I could contribute more.
